h2.br:
​Welcome to GILBERT ARTS ACADEMY
Lauren Arnold, School Leader | 862 E. Elliot Road, Gilbert, AZ 85234 | P (480) 325-6100

div.h2:
Welcome to Gilbert Arts Academy, home of the Mustangs!
Serving Pre-K through 7th grades!

div.font:
Gilbert Arts Academy is a public charter school, located close to the intersection of Elliot and Lindsay Roads in Gilbert, Arizona.
With high standards for academic achievement, our small caring atmosphere personalizes educational instruction for the individual student. Each class provides developmentally appropriate activities to enhance the learning experience. If you're looking for a smaller environment where each child is known by name, come enroll your student, get involved with our Parent Teacher Organization and join the fantastic family of Mustangs!

div.div: 8th grade will be added for the 20/21 school year!

div.style: height: 375px;background-image: url("/uploads/4/3/9/7/4397552/background-images/715456862.jpg") ;background-repeat: no-repeat ;background-position: undefined undefined ;background-size: 100% ;background-color: transparent ;background-size: cover;background-attachment: fixed;

ul.li: Rigorous and Engaging Curriculum Aligned to Common Core Standards
Physical Education, Art and Music Classes for all
School Wide PBIS- Positive Behavior Interventions and Support Program
Certified, Highly Qualified and Dedicated Teachers​
Quarterly Arts Enrichment Programs (4th-7th): Piano, Drama, Choir, Fine Arts​

strong.a: Why choose GAA for your student?

ul.li: Before and After-school program available on campus.
"¡Ofrecemos diferentes niveles de Ingles como segunda lengua (ESL). Los alumnos matriculados en nuestra escuela pueden tomar estas clases gratuitamente!"

br.font:
Lauren Arnold, School Leader
862 E. Elliot Road, Gilbert, AZ 85234
